issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3.Problem
Once the app has downloaded a mp4 file, as large as 140MB, when attempting to save the file it hangs, then it looks like the iPad is being restarted.

Note: Smaller videos work well, no crashing (15MB)

h3.Associated HD Ticket
http://appc.me/c/APP-314474
fields.summary: iPad: downloading and then saving a large movie file crashes the app
fields.environment:
Product: Mobile
    Titanium SDK: Mobile 1.7.1
    Platform OS: iOS
    Platform OS Version: 4.3
